problem_text_cn: 若用半径为9,圆心角为120°的扇形围成一个圆锥的侧面(接缝忽略不计),则这个圆锥的底面半径是()
problem_text_en: If a sector with a radius of N_0 and a central angle of N_1 is used to enclose the lateral surface of a cone (the joints are ignored), then the radius of the bottom of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:设这个圆锥的底面半径是r,\frac{120π×9}{180}=2πr,r=3,故选:B．
